name: Peregrin (itch)
description:
"The journey is everything"

Explore, relax--you have time. You are a traveler, going where the forest may take you. Who are you? Who were you?

Don't rush to the end too soon, or you may find you regret it.

(Playing in fullscreen (accessed through the menu, press space!) is highly recommended!)

I encourage people to send me a message on Twitter about their experiences. ...or poetry!

Infinitely generating forest experience created by Aeryne Wright (@Lissaring) for procjam.

Cuneicorn

notes: Currently, the Mac and Linux versions have yet to be tested, and anything else not thoroughly tested. Let me know on Twitter if you find any bugs!

Donations definitely not required or expected (especially since this is a jam game!) But anything you feel you can give will go towards funding further projects.

(Game saves on every screen, you may return to the forest whenever you like. Just make sure you don't do anything... final).
